meanings.definition: The state or fact of having a duty to deal with something or of having control over someone.
meanings.sent1: My responsibilities include taking care of my little sister after school.
meanings.sent2: Teachers have many responsibilities, such as grading papers and preparing lessons.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to feed the dog today - looks like I neglected my responsibilities!
meanings.sent4: Being a parent comes with a bundle of responsibilities, like being the captain of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The weight of responsibilities on his shoulders made him feel like Atlas holding up the world.

meanings.definition: A thing that one is required to do as part of a job, role, or legal obligation.
meanings.sent1: One of my responsibilities at work is to answer phone calls and emails.
meanings.sent2: Paying bills on time is one of the responsibilities of being an adult.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left the stove on - oops, I forgot my responsibilities as a cook!
meanings.sent4: Her responsibilities at the office felt like a heavy chain around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The knight's responsibilities included protecting the kingdom from invaders.
